channel.title: [530] 2009 Emulation ~ Able-Scape 530
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://www.rune-server.org/static/signaturepic/sigpic238549_2.gif[/img] [COLOR=#006600][SIZE=4]Our Goal:[/SIZE][/COLOR] [B][SIZE=2][COLOR=#33CC33] NOTE: We are currently in the beta stages.
In Able-Scape we aim for pure RuneScape emulation. No custom items, skills, or areas will be added. The only difference* from our server and the 530 revision of RuneScape is the experience rate, which is set to x10. Double/bonus xp weekends will be implemented in a few weeks, depending on how the beta is going.
After the first few weeks of the beta, we will have special events for players to obtain rare items; Party hats, Santa hats, some Dragon pieces, other cosmetic items, and even GP will be in the prize pool. This is so we can get the economy "kickstarted", and get those otherwise unobtainable rare items into the game. There will only be a select few players who receive these prizes, as to retain their "rare" title. There will be more information about these events on the website, of course.
We are looking for anybody interested in a pure 530 remake to join us in the beta.
Right now we are working countless hours to make sure we are able to give the best 530 experience for everyone. If you have any suggestions to make this server better, be sure to let us know (as long as the suggestion is remake related). [/COLOR][/SIZE][/B]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aM6bf6h.png[/img]
[URL=http://"http://able-scape.com/"][IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/42281647/ad/forums.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://"https://dl.dropbox.com/s/628bqr3788hrqt9/Able-Scape%20530.jar"][IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/42281647/ad/download.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://"https://dl.dropbox.com/s/628bqr3788hrqt9/Able-Scape%20530.jar"][IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/42281647/ad/playnow.png[/img][/URL][/CENTER]
[U][B]Team:[/B][/U] [COLOR=#00FF00][URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/abexlry/"]Abexlry[/URL] (Developer/Owner)[/COLOR] [COLOR=#FF0000][URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/derka/"]Derka/Savy/Hex[/URL] (Developer) [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/sambu/"]Sambu/Xen[/URL] (Developer) [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/tis+_jordan/"]Tis _Jordan[/URL] (Developer) [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/brainiac/"]Brainiac[/URL] (Developer) [/COLOR]
[CENTER][SPOILER=Features] [B]Features:[/B] [COLOR=#00FF00]x10 Experience rate Regional Music System HD Client No custom object spawns or items Real Quests!!! Almost all of the agility courses All thievable npcs and stalls all rocks mine-able Character design (Male and Female, all clothes/colors)[/COLOR] [/SPOILER] [SPOILER=Skills] [I]Skills:[/I] Note: Not all skill features have been worked on or looked into yet. I will try to keep this post updated as more things are worked on and completed.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jfb9QXj.png[/img][B]Combat:[/B]
[ul][*][COLOR=#00FF00]Item requirements added. (except for a given few I may have missed)[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Clipping system.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#FFA500]Perfect combat formulas.[/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4MAeWEL.png[/img][B]Magic:[/B]
[ul][*][COLOR=#00FF00]Spell level requirements added. [/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RBEEWm6.png[/img][B]Farming:[/B]
[ul][*][COLOR=#00FF00]Crops grow over time.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]All seeds and plants working.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Multiple patches.[/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CwzO5kG.png[/img][B]Agility:[/B]
[ul][*][COLOR=#00FF00]Gnome agility course.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Barbarian agility course.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Ape Atoll agility course.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Wilderness agility course.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#FFA500]Course level requirements.[/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/z05FUc0.png[/img][B]Woodcutting:[/B]
[ul][*][COLOR=#00FF00]Axe level requirements.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Bird nests.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]All trees and axes working.[/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Nnz8aJk.png[/img][B]Fishing:[/B]
[ul][*][COLOR=#00FF00]All fishing spots.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Fishing item requirements.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Correct fishing loot.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Correct fishing timers.[/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IUqy5Fu.png[/img][B]Firemaking:[/B]
[ul][*][COLOR=#00FF00]All log fires working.[/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qCAx2Gi.png[/img][B]Herblore:[/B]
[ul][*][COLOR=#00FF00]Cleaning herbs working.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Druidic Ritual quest. (needed in order to start Herblore)[/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nE55lL0.png[/img][B]Cooking:[/B]
[ul][*][COLOR=#00FF00]Fish.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Meat.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#FFA500]Pizzas/pies.[/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/c0bWA5H.png[/img][B]Crafting:[/B]
[ul][*][COLOR=#00FF00]Cutting gems.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#FFA500]Tanning/crafting hides.[/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MlQl0xS.png[/img][B]Fletching:[/B]
[ul][*][COLOR=#00FF00]Log cutting.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Stringing bows.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#FFA500]Arrow making.[/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/67vh0cc.png[/img][B]Runecrafting:[/B]
[ul][*][COLOR=#00FF00]Crafting runes.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Multipliers.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#FFA500]High level altars.[/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vHASgAK.png[/img][B]Slayer:[/B]
[ul][*][COLOR=#FFA500]All Slayer Masters.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#FFA500]All monsters.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#FFA500]Enchanted gem.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#FFA500]Required gear to kill slayer monsters.[/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8iQzWh3.png[/img][B]Thieving:[/B]
[ul][*][COLOR=#00FF00]All pickpocket npcs.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Proper loot from pickpockets.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Stalls.[/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/B496ICo.png[/img][B]Mining:[/B]
[ul][*][COLOR=#00FF00]Minerals with respawn times.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Prospect.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Pickaxe requirements.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Random gems.[/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5H8bvPz.png[/img][B]Smithing:[/B]
[ul][*][COLOR=#00FF00]Smelting bars.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Smithing bars.[/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZtJyw45.png[/img][B]Prayer:[/B]
[ul][*][COLOR=#00FF00]Recharge at altars.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Proper switching.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]All prayers.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#FFA500]Bones on altar.[/COLOR][/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KcAR65Z.png[/img]Miscellaneous:
[ul][*][COLOR=#00FF00]Login welcome screen.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Quest system. (updates upon completion/start of quest, loads upon login also)[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Interact-able npcs.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Interact-able objects.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Interact-able items.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Proper npc drops.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Proper npc spawns.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Proper shop items.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#FF0000]Bank tabs.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Player Following (with RuneScape-like dancing).[/COLOR]
Quests: [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Rune Mysteries Quest.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Doric's Quest.[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Druidic Ritual Quest[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#FFA500]Cook's Assistant Quest.[/COLOR][/ul]
[/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Media] [B]Media:[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tQjMXV3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MfFJs1G.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3981499/Screenshot_21.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3981501/Screenshot_20.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3981502/Screenshot_16.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uu4e4Sv.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://imgur.com/xbOhf2b.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ATzHXH9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/olQkffP.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LVgQ1nl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IneIRxp.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3977601/gKwtlyI.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3977606/kHfEijN.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3977607/Screenshot_17.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3977609/Screenshot_18.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Changelog (Kept up to date)] ~~~3/14/2014~~~ Added player following and dancing Added run drain
~~~3/15/2014~~~ Added npc examines
~~~3/16/2014~~~ Fixed GE Abort offer bug (which enabled the gaining of double profits) Added Stronghold of Security gate system
~~~3/19/2014~~~ Fixed bug which enabled players to use an object when they weren't near it Spawned a magic portal (object 2156) in the player safety stronghold for a poster replacement as it doesnt work Added dialogue when going down sos ladder Added basic NPC following system
~~~3/22/2014~~~ Added 2 Able-Scape tools. NPC Drops adder/Shop adder
~~~3/23/2014~~~ Added right-click bank bankers Added minimum rights requirement for each command
~~~3/24/2014~~~ Changed death location to Lumbridge Added Lumbridge castle stairs Added most (if not all) npcDefinitions Added/fixed a few wooden gates throughout the world Prayer now recharges +1 prayer point upon levelup Fixed a few wrong weapon attack animations Added Lumbridge to Al Kharid toll gate, dialogue and all
~~~3/27/2014~~~ You can now login while in HD mode. Interfaces load as they should (99%) Fixed some broken NPC attack/defence/death emotes
~~~3/28/2014~~~ Added flashing skill icons for the skill(s) you just leveled up, also comes with chatbox interface showing what you can do next with that skill More doors... You'll walk to furnaces now before opening interface Added a shophandler
~~~3/30/2014~~~ Added clipped ranged projectiles (still working on mage) Added clipped mage (both range/mage need a little work)
~~~4/2/2014~~~ Added easy dialogue managers (like PI) Added Doric's quest
~~~4/4/2014~~~ Fixed up Doric's quest, works 99% Added a questHandler system, which include: completed quest interface, quest log cleanup, questpoints, quest tab color/update Fixed altars/prayer (had a bad setLevel method) Added half-assed Rune Mysteries quest (needs work with dialogue etc) updating works Started on Druidic Ritual Nests from trees properly turn into uncrushed bird nests Nests are crushable via pestle and mortar Fixed some minor level requirement bugs for spells
~~~4/6/2014~~~ All clothes/wrists/arms work with correct switching, working on hair/beards All hair/beards work with correct switching Cleaned up a bit of console output Female clothes working. Character design works 99% Added some global drops, global respawn rate of 1 minute
~~~4/7/2014~~~ Added welcome screen Changed up the first login event Added interface while you create your character for the first time Modified mining timers, made them so the higher the mining level, the lower the time Modified woodcutting timers also, made them so the higher the wc lvl, the lower the time
~~~4/8/2014~~~ Added easy/preset chatheads Added some world npc dialogue
~~~4/9/2014~~~ Fixed some ranged/mage combat bugs Fixed the ability to cast/kill non combat npcs Minor bug fixes Added 90% of Druidic Ritual, need to do some more dialogue and object events
~~~4/10/2014~~~ Finished Druidic Ritual (added 100%) Players can no longer enter the essence mines unless they have done rune mysteries
~~~4/11/2014~~~ Started Learning the Ropes Minor bug fixes ::yell now displays [Player] [Mod] or [Admin] before names, also has colors (blue, red, green)
~~~4/12/2014~~~ Modified nest chances to 1/100 Added idle logout (logouts when the client sends the idle packet ^.^) Added basic music system (two songs confirmed working so far) Minor bug fixes
~~~4/13/2014~~~ More music :D Levelup sounds Region changing music system
~~~4/15/2014~~~ Skill levelup sounds depending on the skill
~~~4/16/2014~~~ Added shops: -Varrock Swordshop -Thessalia's Fine Clothes -Horvik's Armour Shop -Lowe's Archery Emporium [/SPOILER]
[/CENTER]

item.title: [530] 2009 Emulation ~ Able-Scape 530
item.dc:creator: @Savy2007 Savy2007
item.description:
@Savy2007 wrote:

[CENTER]
[COLOR=#006600][SIZE=4]Our Goal:[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[B][SIZE=2][COLOR=#33CC33]
NOTE: We are currently in the beta stages.

In Able-Scape we aim for pure RuneScape emulation. No custom items, skills, or areas will be added. The only difference* from our server and the 530 revision of RuneScape is the experience rate, which is set to x10. Double/bonus xp weekends will be implemented in a few weeks, depending on how the beta is going.

After the first few weeks of the beta, we will have special events for players to obtain rare items; Party hats, Santa hats, some Dragon pieces, other cosmetic items, and even GP will be in the prize pool. This is so we can get the economy “kickstarted”, and get those otherwise unobtainable rare items into the game. There will only be a select few players who receive these prizes, as to retain their “rare” title. There will be more information about these events on the website, of course.

We are looking for anybody interested in a pure 530 remake to join us in the beta.

Right now we are working countless hours to make sure we are able to give the best 530 experience for everyone. If you have any suggestions to make this server better, be sure to let us know (as long as the suggestion is remake related). [/COLOR][/SIZE][/B]

[URL=http://“http://able-scape.com/”][/URL]
[URL=http://“https://dl.dropbox.com/s/628bqr3788hrqt9/Able-Scape%20530.jar”][/URL]
[URL=http://“https://dl.dropbox.com/s/628bqr3788hrqt9/Able-Scape%20530.jar”][/URL][/CENTER]

[U][B]Team:[/B][/U]
[COLOR=#00FF00][URL=http://“http://www.rune-server.org/members/abexlry/”]Abexlry[/URL] (Developer/Owner)[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#FF0000][URL=http://“http://www.rune-server.org/members/derka/”]Derka/Savy/Hex[/URL] (Developer)

[/COLOR]

[CENTER][SPOILER=Features]
[B]Features:[/B]
[COLOR=#00FF00]x10 Experience rate
Regional Music System
HD Client
No custom object spawns or items
Real Quests!!!
Almost all of the agility courses
All thievable npcs and stalls
all rocks mine-able
Character design (Male and Female, all clothes/colors)[/COLOR]
[/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Skills]
[I]Skills:[/I]
Note: Not all skill features have been worked on or looked into yet.
I will try to keep this post updated as more things are worked on and completed.

[B]Combat:[/B]

[ul][][COLOR=#00FF00]Item requirements added. (except for a given few I may have missed)[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00FF00]Clipping system.[/COLOR]
[*][COLOR=#FFA500]Perfect combat formulas.[/COLOR][/ul]

[ul][*][COLOR=#00FF00]Spell level requirements added. [/COLOR][/ul]

[ul][][COLOR=#00FF00]Crops grow over time.[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00FF00]All seeds and plants working.[/COLOR]
[*][COLOR=#00FF00]Multiple patches.[/COLOR][/ul]

[B]Agility:[/B]

[ul][][COLOR=#00FF00]Gnome agility course.[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00FF00]Barbarian agility course.[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00FF00]Ape Atoll agility course.[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00FF00]Wilderness agility course.[/COLOR]
[*][COLOR=#FFA500]Course level requirements.[/COLOR][/ul]

[B]Woodcutting:[/B]

[ul][][COLOR=#00FF00]Axe level requirements.[/COLOR]

[*][COLOR=#00FF00]All trees and axes working.[/COLOR][/ul]

[B]Firemaking:[/B]

[ul][*][COLOR=#00FF00]All log fires working.[/COLOR][/ul]

[B]Herblore:[/B]

[ul][][COLOR=#00FF00]Cleaning herbs working.[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00FF00]Druidic Ritual quest. (needed in order to start Herblore)[/COLOR][/ul]

[B]Cooking:[/B]

[ul][][COLOR=#00FF00]Fish.[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00FF00]Meat.[/COLOR]

[][COLOR=#00FF00]Stringing bows.[/COLOR]
[*][COLOR=#FFA500]Arrow making.[/COLOR][/ul]

[][COLOR=#00FF00]Multipliers.[/COLOR]

[ul][][COLOR=#FFA500]All Slayer Masters.[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#FFA500]All monsters.[/COLOR]

[][COLOR=#FFA500]Required gear to kill slayer monsters.[/COLOR][/ul]

[B]Thieving:[/B]

[ul][][COLOR=#00FF00]All pickpocket npcs.[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00FF00]Proper loot from pickpockets.[/COLOR]
[*][COLOR=#00FF00]Stalls.[/COLOR][/ul]

[B]Mining:[/B]

[ul][][COLOR=#00FF00]Minerals with respawn times.[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00FF00]Prospect.[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00FF00]Pickaxe requirements.[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00FF00]Random gems.[/COLOR][/ul]

[B]Smithing:[/B]

[ul][][COLOR=#00FF00]Smelting bars.[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00FF00]Smithing bars.[/COLOR][/ul]

[B]Prayer:[/B]

[ul][][COLOR=#00FF00]Recharge at altars.[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00FF00]Proper switching.[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00FF00]All prayers.[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#FFA500]Bones on altar.[/COLOR][/ul]

Miscellaneous:

[ul][][COLOR=#00FF00]Login welcome screen.[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00FF00]Quest system. (updates upon completion/start of quest, loads upon login also)[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00FF00]Interact-able npcs.[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00FF00]Interact-able objects.[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00FF00]Interact-able items.[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00FF00]Proper npc drops.[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00FF00]Proper npc spawns.[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00FF00]Proper shop items.[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#FF0000]Bank tabs.[/COLOR]

Quests:
[][COLOR=#00FF00]Rune Mysteries Quest.[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00FF00]Doric’s Quest.[/COLOR]
[][COLOR=#00FF00]Druidic Ritual Quest[/COLOR]

[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=Media]
[B]Media:[/B]















[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=Changelog (Kept up to date)]
~3/14/2014~
Added player following and dancing
Added run drain

~3/15/2014~
Added npc examines

~3/16/2014~
Fixed GE Abort offer bug (which enabled the gaining of double profits)
Added Stronghold of Security gate system

~3/19/2014~
Fixed bug which enabled players to use an object when they weren’t near it
Spawned a magic portal (object 2156) in the player safety stronghold for a poster replacement as it doesnt work
Added dialogue when going down sos ladder
Added basic NPC following system

~3/22/2014~
Added 2 Able-Scape tools. NPC Drops adder/Shop adder

~3/23/2014~
Added right-click bank bankers
Added minimum rights requirement for each command

~3/24/2014~
Changed death location to Lumbridge
Added Lumbridge castle stairs
Added most (if not all) npcDefinitions
Added/fixed a few wooden gates throughout the world
Prayer now recharges +1 prayer point upon levelup
Fixed a few wrong weapon attack animations
Added Lumbridge to Al Kharid toll gate, dialogue and all

~3/27/2014~
You can now login while in HD mode. Interfaces load as they should (99%)
Fixed some broken NPC attack/defence/death emotes

~3/28/2014~
Added flashing skill icons for the skill(s) you just leveled up, also comes with chatbox interface showing what you can do next with that skill
More doors…
You’ll walk to furnaces now before opening interface
Added a shophandler

~3/30/2014~
Added clipped ranged projectiles (still working on mage)
Added clipped mage (both range/mage need a little work)

~4/2/2014~
Added easy dialogue managers (like PI)
Added Doric’s quest

~4/4/2014~
Fixed up Doric’s quest, works 99%
Added a questHandler system, which include: completed quest interface, quest log cleanup, questpoints, quest tab color/update
Fixed altars/prayer (had a bad setLevel method)
Added half-assed Rune Mysteries quest (needs work with dialogue etc) updating works
Started on Druidic Ritual
Nests from trees properly turn into uncrushed bird nests
Nests are crushable via pestle and mortar
Fixed some minor level requirement bugs for spells

~4/6/2014~
All clothes/wrists/arms work with correct switching, working on hair/beards
All hair/beards work with correct switching
Cleaned up a bit of console output
Female clothes working. Character design works 99%
Added some global drops, global respawn rate of 1 minute

~4/7/2014~
Added welcome screen
Changed up the first login event
Added interface while you create your character for the first time
Modified mining timers, made them so the higher the mining level, the lower the time
Modified woodcutting timers also, made them so the higher the wc lvl, the lower the time

~4/8/2014~
Added easy/preset chatheads
Added some world npc dialogue

~4/9/2014~
Fixed some ranged/mage combat bugs
Fixed the ability to cast/kill non combat npcs
Minor bug fixes
Added 90% of Druidic Ritual, need to do some more dialogue and object events

~4/10/2014~
Finished Druidic Ritual (added 100%)
Players can no longer enter the essence mines unless they have done rune mysteries

~4/11/2014~
Started Learning the Ropes
Minor bug fixes
::yell now displays [Player] [Mod] or [Admin] before names, also has colors (blue, red, green)

~4/12/2014~
Modified nest chances to 1/100
Added idle logout (logouts when the client sends the idle packet ^.^)
Added basic music system (two songs confirmed working so far)
Minor bug fixes

~4/13/2014~
More music
Levelup sounds
Region changing music system

~4/15/2014~
Skill levelup sounds depending on the skill

~4/16/2014~
Added shops:
-Varrock Swordshop
-Thessalia’s Fine Clothes
-Horvik’s Armour Shop
-Lowe’s Archery Emporium
[/SPOILER]

[/CENTER]

Read full topic
